critique: This document pertains to the National Industrial Recovery Act and an amendment to the Code of Fair Competition for the Cotton Textile Industry. It reflects President Roosevelt's actions during the New Deal era. Here's an analysis of its political bias:Ideological Tilt: The document reflects a liberal approach due to its interventionist nature in the economy.
